FAQ's

Will I recieve a certificate for each course?

Yes. Each student who completes any course will receive a certificate of completion to acknowledge their proficiency. We encourage students to include these on their LinkedIn profiles and in their job applications!

Will I get the source code of each course?

Yes. You will get source code of all courses when you complete the specific course videos.

Can i ask anything related course or if my code doesn't work?

Yes. You can contact us via our email : klassconnectsupport@gmail.com

Can i download course videos?

For copyright reasons we don't encourage downloading them.
